gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the organization export.

resource_type.description: The type of resource contained in the export (e.g., projects, tasks).

created_at.description: The date and time when the organization export was created.

download_url.description: The URL from which the organization export can be downloaded.

state.description: The current state of the organization export (e.g., exporting, completed).

organization.description: Details of the organization associated with the export.

gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the organization.

resource_type.description: The type of resource being exported (e.g., projects, tasks).
